verses.html:
1
The True Church is established,
God is in His holy place;
Sing glory to Lord Jesus
Who forever reigns in grace.
The True Church is now raised up,
This the promise of the Lord;
Glory to His holy name,
Praise the Lord, Hallelujah!

2
The True Church is established
By the Holy Spiritâ€™s power,
Sing glory to Lord Jesus
During this most blessed hour.
The True Church is now raised up,
Truth be her foundation firm;
Hallelujah, Praise His name,
Glory, sing Hallelujah!
